attributes.title: What

attributes.review: I opened the app. And it immediately wanted all of my information. Like what??? Asking for my phone number. Name. Email address. And even my zip code. Why does trump want to know where I live? Anyways I don‚Äôt recommend this app at all. Totally looks sketchy. I feel like trump is spying on us Americans. How about Obama 2020. !!!!
attributes.title: This app is horrible ü§Æ

attributes.review: As soon as I tried to open it, the app froze. I couldn‚Äôt do anything so I tried to close the app. Didn‚Äôt work. Eventually I restarted my phone. Thankfully I was now able to open the app and so I typed in my name and phone number. It seems this was too much for it to handle as once again the app crashed. At least I got my verification code. So a second time I restart my phone and open the app. Luckily now it seems to be working. I am also though a bit disappointed by the reward points system. I need 100,000 points to be able to get a picture with my President. Unfortunately I don‚Äôt have $10,000 to donate. Some snowflakes hacked into my OnlyThePOTUSwillMAGA Facebook account. So it seems I can‚Äôt share 100,000 things to Facebook either. I‚Äôm not sure what I‚Äôll do. üò≠
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: When I first logged in, the app asked for my phone number. So I put in my number and everything was fine. I scrolled through the app looking at all the pictures of Hillary Clintonüòç Shortly after everything went downhill. The president himself messages me and I was in great disbelief. He said I was a perfect match for his son Barron ü•∞ I declined his offer because I didn‚Äôt want to be attacked by all the girls who are madly in love with his son. After this , I started to get spammed by the secret service. I was very scared so I blocked all the numbers. When I tried to delete the app my phone started replaying the same word ‚ÄúHelloo‚Äù üëÅüëÅThe word was strangely familiar but I‚Äôm not thinking much of it. My phone started glitching and doesn‚Äôt work anymore. I‚Äôm writing this message on paper and the words are magically flying into my broken phone. Because of mrs. Rona I can‚Äôt go outside to buy a new one üíû If anything Barron will fall in love with me without his fathers help. Please get this app removed and please tell Barron to message me personally at 1(234) 567- 890
attributes.title: Trump wants me to be with Barron
